SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class NetworkerTcp

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.NetworkerTcp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Networker, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class NetworkerTcp extends Object implements Networker, PropertyChangeListener

Class used to manage the tcp connection.

  • Creates socket, reader and the object output stream;
  • sends message to server;
  • starts disconnection.
